task_text: I'm joining Bellini soon. Where can I read about how time tracking works, and what are the main reasons we track time?

text_blocks: I can see you're accessing from the public website (is_public=true). This means you're not yet an employee in our system.

input.message:
Welcome to Bellini Coatings! I'm glad to hear you'll be joining us soon.

However, information about our time tracking procedures is part of our internal documentation and is only available to employees. Once you've officially joined and have access to our internal systems, you'll be able to read our time tracking wiki and guidelines.

In the meantime, if you have general questions about onboarding or need information before your start date, please reach out to your HR contact or hiring manager directly. They'll be happy to help you prepare for your first day!
